title: Scripting
body: Where do I go to report someone for scripting? I got video and everything. It's nasty af.

replies.body:
Wolfess is 100% spot on here, so I recommend following the steps they've given. 

I'd also like to mention that you can check out our [**Reporting a Player Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752884-Reporting-a-Player) to see how player reports work and what other behavior is and isn't reportable. Let me know if you have any questions.

normally you just report them in the post-game screen via the red "!" button. this is the best way to report someone.

if you accidentally miss that chance, you can submit a ticket with your evidence below:


https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new

Make sure to pick “I have a question About League of Legends/Riot Games” and then “Games and Features -> General Questions”.
